posts.subject: The real attraction of Galactichan?
posts.body:
Might induce users to behave responsibly by seeding the material they consume. No icons, no pick and choose....if you want it you must download it *first*. Only then can you decide not to seed by making the effort NOT to seed.

This is a place for selected 4chan dumps. It's a test board. Efforts will be made to eliminate duplicates - but only if the hash value has not been changed.

Haven't tried it yet, but suspect that any SQLite based image organizer (many) like Shotwell will make quick work of organizing the images posted here.

Please confine postings to POL here. Porn is better handled by a second board devoted to that subject.

Edit: After much thrashing around, managed to locate the "src" directory for this board - then sucked all images into the Shotwell library. So it works - and it's very fast.

Used in this way, Shotwell provides purpose built image management - free of browser burdens. Need to test this on a more populated directory - but all is looking good.
